english.segment1: Turn away I'll pull the fangs out. Spinning room it's getting dark. This is the green lift, this is the archer. You never say that. This is the green lift, this is the archer
english.segment2: This starry night, the blue of seas. Are lifted off the ground. So poised and still, the figures hold. That I will not be found
english.segment3: Turn away the Islet spiders. Gloaming pulse, the Siletzs stole
english.segment4: This is the green lift, this is the archer. You never say that. This is the green lift, this is the archer
english.segment5: This starry night, the blue of seas. Are lifted off the ground. So poised and still, the figures hold. That I will not be found
english.segment6: This is the green lift, this is the archer (x4)
english.segment7: This starry night, the blue of seas. Are lifted off the ground. So poised and still, the figures hold. That I will not be found
